creditline: Gift of Sandra and Peter Butler
description: 3/4-length study of a bare-chested young woman, with a white cloth around her waist and long dark hair, leaning her head to the PR, standing in front of a window with city buildings visible behind her
image_copyright: © Estate of Paul Delvaux %2F Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York %2F SABAM%2C Belgium
medium: Pen and black ink and watercolor
provenance: (Staempfli Gallery, New York, 1971]) Mr. and Mrs. Patrick Butler, St. Paul; Sandra Peter Butler, St. Paul; given to MIA, 2011.
signed: LRC, in black ink: A TAM / WESTENDE / P. DELVAUX / 26-12-56
title: Female Nude Standing Before a Window
